Celeron knew it was going to come to this.  But he needed the work,
and had=
n't been outside in a while (he hoped that the security system
wouldn't per=
vent him from going outside), so he took a scanner, nodded
to Hellplague an=
d headed for the hatch....hoping it would open for
him.

On Sat, 18 Dec 200=
4 22:08:20 -0800 (PST), robert riley
<bustercross365@...> wrote:

llplague:
>

ndition.  Check for major hull damage, and access if you can the
> possibli=
ty of repairing it enough to fly."

nything else to do?"
